item.description: Since this is the last day of summer, let's make it count! --I'd like to do this hike in the 'syrup light' of the late afternoon. We'll do a 1 to 1.5 hour loop in the Goodwin Forest. We'll leave from the parking area around 4.15, so please be on time if you want to join. Wear good hiking boots (it will probably be muddy in parts) and bring water. Afterwards I will offer drinks and snacks. If it pours we will reschedule. :D We tend to hike at a fairly brisk pace, but the trail is not at all technically difficult and is pretty flat.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the parking area opposite the Nature Center/Museum

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Late Afternoon Hiking on the Autumnal Equinox
